com.github.wuic.util
Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.util.IOUtils

public final class IOUtils
extends Object

Utility class built on top of the java.io package helping WUIC to deal with I/O.

Since:
0.3.1
Version:
1.5
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Field Summary

          The slash character is the standard separator used internally, even on windows platform.

          Length of a memory buffer used in WUIC.

          All ZIP files begins with this magic number.

close

public static void close(Closeable... closeableArray)

Tries to close the given objects and log the IOException at INFO level to make the code more readable when we assume that the IOException won't be managed.

Also ignore null parameters.

Parameters:
closeableArray - the objects to close

isArchive

                         throws IOException

Checks if the given stream points represents a valid ZIP archive.

Parameters:
inputStream - the stream to check
Returns:
true if the stream should be an archive, false otherwise
Throws:
IOException

listFile

public static List<String> listFile(DirectoryPath parent,
                                    Pattern pattern)
                             throws StreamException

Lists all the files from the given directory matching the given pattern.

For instance, if a directory /foo contains a path in foo/oof/path.js, calling this method with an Pattern .* will result in an array containing the String oof/path.js.

Parameters:
parent - the directory
pattern - the pattern to filter files
Returns:
the matching files
Throws:
StreamException - if any I/O error occurs

listFile

public static List<String> listFile(DirectoryPath parent,
                                    Pattern pattern,
                                    List<String> skipStartsWithList)
                             throws StreamException

Searches as specified in listFile(com.github.wuic.path.DirectoryPath, java.util.regex.Pattern) with a list that contains all begin paths to ignore.

Parameters:
parent - the directory
pattern - the pattern to filter files
skipStartsWithList - a list that contains all begin paths to ignore
Returns:
the matching files
Throws:
StreamException - if any I/O error occurs

listFile

public static List<String> listFile(DirectoryPath parent,
                                    String relativePath,
                                    Pattern pattern,
                                    List<String> skipStartsWithList)
                             throws StreamException

Lists the files matching the given pattern in the directory path and its subdirectory represented by a specified relativePath.

Parameters:
parent - the parent
relativePath - the directory path relative to the parent
pattern - the pattern which filters files
skipStartsWithList - a list that contains all begin paths to ignore
Returns:
the matching files
Throws:
StreamException - if any I/O error occurs

buildPath

public static Path buildPath(String path,
                             DirectoryPathFactory factory)
                      throws IOException

Returns a hierarchy of paths represented by the given String. The given DirectoryPathFactory is used to create directories.

Parameters:
path - the path hierarchy
factory - the factory.
Returns:
the last Path of the hierarchy with its parent
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs

buildPath

public static Path buildPath(String path)
                      throws IOException

Returns a hierarchy of paths represented by the given String. Uses a FsDirectoryPathFactory to create instances.

Parameters:
path - the path hierarchy
Returns:
the last Path of the hierarchy with its parent
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs
